scripts.build: npx esbuild src/index.js --bundle --outfile=build/assets/bundle.js --define:process.env.NODE_ENV='"production"' --minify --loader:.js=jsx && if not exist build mkdir build && copy /Y public\index.html build\index.html && (if exist public\404.html copy /Y public\404.html build\404.html) && (if exist public copy /Y public\* build\ 1>nul 2>nul)
